name: VR Experience (itch)
description:
IMPORTANT NOTE! This game does NOT require VR Headset to be played. It is not VR compatible, as ironic as that sounds.

A dark Escape Room game. Immerse yourself in this twisted experience as you travel trough different settings trying to escape. How deep the rabbit hole will you go? Uncover the mystery revolving this strange, enigmatic building and S̙͚͈ͅE̝̣T̯͇̼͕̰͢ ̷̰̼̼̭̹̥T̜̯̦̠̜̖̳H̠̻E̡̫̟͕̲̩͔M̬͓ͅ ͍̣͙̦̠̜ͅF̲̤͖̣͕̟͚͠R̺̙̩̹̯͠E͖̗̜͔̻É̹͉̻̗.

Please, enjoy our comfy installations! It's still a demo, but the story will TOTALLY CATCH YOU! *quite literally*

:)
